snippet: Clear, the company that expedites airport security clearance, is starting to expand aggressively again.
abstract: Joe Sharkey On the Road column observes that airport security clearance expediter Clear is starting to expand aggressively again after emerging from bankruptcy; notes it is proposing a pilot program with the Transportation Security Administration that would rejuvenate the idea of partnerships between private enterprise and the government in air travel security.
lead_paragraph: Clear, the company that expedites airport security clearance, is starting to expand aggressively again.

headline.print_headline: A Partnership Aims At Streamlining Security
headline.seo: An Eye on Streamlining Security - On the Road
headline.main: A Partnership Aims at Streamlining Security
